channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: i am new to coding 508 servers. how do i change what it says when i log in on my server?such as welcome to...scape how do i make myself owner.

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Have not worked with 508 yet. But if there is like a main.java or something you can find possibility it is in that. Or if you download a copy of JCreator which is free, You can search all the java files in an entire directory for a keyword. [/font]

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @bobby11 bobby1
item.description:
@bobby11 wrote:

u sure thats for 508’s i can’t find client.java,charactor folder is different

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Find the “characters” folder and in it should be your [characters name].txt. Open it up and scroll down to find playerRights or player-rights or something similar. Change it to 3 for admin.

For changing the welcome message open up client.java and search for what it currently says when you login, change that :)[/font]

Read full topic
